name: All-Star Fighters
summary: Known in Japan as "The All*Star Kakutou Matsuri". All-Star Fighters is the 91st entry in the Simple 2000 budget game series for the PS2, bringing together characters and locales from many different Simple 2000 games in a bizarre fighting tournament.

alternative_names.name: Simple 2000 Series Vol. 91: The All Star Kakutou
